Midway Firearms - America's largest online firearms and accessories mall.

1 day ago - MidwayUSA, originally established as Ely Arms, Inc., began as a small firearms retailer in Columbia, Missouri, on June 18, 1977. It was established by Larry Potterfield, with initial co-ownership by his brother Jerry, in a 151 square metres (1,630 sq ft) metal, pole-frame building.
Can't find what you're looking for? MidwayUSA has a huge selection of high-quality brands to choose from.

Midwest Gun Works specializes in quality gun parts, shooting accessories, firearms and firearm service for most major manufacturers including Browning, Winchester, FN America, Beretta, Benelli, Franchi, Stoeger, Remington, Bushmaster, Marlin, Sig Sauer, HK and many more.

t: Behind The Brand: MidwayUSA - Gun Digest
s: May 10, 2024 - MidwayUSA started as Ely Arms Inc. and, according to Potterfield, “then changed to Midway Arms, Inc., in 1980, and then to MidwayUSA after the internet came along, about 1998. ‘Midway’ is now the brand, and we’ve established it over 40 years ago.”

t: CPSC, Midway Arms Announce Recall of Tumblers | CPSC.gov
s: Midway Arms has received 13 reports of motors overheating and catching fire. Five of these fires caused minor and major property damage beyond the tumbler. No injuries have been reported. Only tumblers sold under the Midway and Past brand names are involved in this recall.
